channel.title: Polka on Sermon Archives
channel.description: Recent content in Polka on Sermon Archives

item.title: Test Post
item.description: This is a test post to verify functionality. This sermon was preached at Emmanuel Lutheran Church, as a part of a “Polka Service” featuring music by “Jerry Voelker and His Jolly Gents”. The text is from the Eleventh Sunday of Pentecost B. Exodus 16: 11-12 is listed as the sermon text. In addition to the sermon, a scanned copy of the bulletin is included. ##FOR GRUMBLERS, THE BREAD OF LIFE 11PentB (8/7/94) Ex.
